completed_steps.summary: Classified as multi-part Tauri Desktop Application. Root (Web), src-tauri (Native Rust).
Found existing docs in docs/, conductor/, and plans/.
Tech stack: React 18, Vite, TS, Zustand, TanStack Query, Framer Motion, D3. Backend: Rust 1.6.0, Tokio.
AI synthesis flow mapped from SynthesisPanel.tsx to synthesis_service.rs. Shared state and components analyzed.
Generated comprehensive doc set: Overview, Source Tree, Architecture, Dev Guide, API Contracts.
Master index.md generated as primary AI entry point.

findings.project_classification: Multi-part Tauri Desktop Application. Frontend: React/Vite/TS. Backend: Rust.

core_logic.synthesis: SynthesisPanel.tsx triggers RAG-based bundling in synthesis_service.rs via Tauri IPC.

resume_instructions: Starting from step 2: Discover existing documentation
